content.question: Which of the following was true of the American labor movement in the late nineteenth century?

choices.label: It was controlled by immigrant socialists and anarchists.
It was confined to factory workers.
It was protected from employer harassment by federal law and policy.
It was allied with the Democratic party.
It was involved in a number of violent strikes.

content.answer: It was involved in a number of violent strikes.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
